original: @321b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @321b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: dharma dha rme bi ni shtsa ya /
analyzed: dharma dha rme bi ni shtsa ya /
translated: Dharmādharmaviniścaya

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: chos dang chos can gtan la dbab pa /
analyzed: chos dang chos can gtan la dbab pa /
translated: Ascertainment of Dharma and Dharmin

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī.🔽The summary: The nature, enumeration,🔽its extensive classification,🔽the presentation of distinctions, and the definitive terms

original: sdom la ngo bo dang ni rnam grangs dang // de yi rgyas par dbye ba dang // bye brag rnam gzhag nges pa'i tshig / rnam pa lnga yi shes par bya //
analyzed: sdom la ngo bo dang ni rnam grangs dang // de yi rgyas par dbye ba dang // bye brag rnam gzhag nges pa'i tshig / rnam pa lnga yi shes par bya //
translated: should be known in five parts.

original: de la chos dang chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo ni don rnams kyi khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi ste /
analyzed: de la chos dang chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo ni don rnams kyi khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi ste /
translated: Regarding that, the nature of dharma and dharmin is the particularity and the basis of particularity of objects.🔽Moreover, in general, it is the sound of chance, cognition,

original: de yang spyir ni 'dod rgyal gyi sgra dang shes pa dang / don ston pa dang / 'jam pa'i sgra dang / shes pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: de yang spyir ni 'dod rgyal gyi sgra dang shes pa dang / don ston pa dang / 'jam pa'i sgra dang / shes pa'i yul lo //
translated: the presentation of meaning, the sound of softness, and the object of cognition.

original: don ston pa de yang don tsam ston pa'i sgra dang / don gyi khyad par ston pa'i sgra'i tshul gnyis las sgra gnyis pa'i brjod bya'o //
analyzed: don ston pa de yang don tsam ston pa'i sgra dang / don gyi khyad par ston pa'i sgra'i tshul gnyis las sgra gnyis pa'i brjod bya'o //
translated: That presentation of meaning is the object of expression of the second type of sound, from among the two ways of sound: the sound that presents mere meaning and the sound that presents the particularity of meaning.

original: de la don tsam ston pa ni gzugs la bdag yod dam med ces the tshom za ba la mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bdag med par bstan pa ni gtan tshigs mi rtag pa'i don tsam mam /
analyzed: de la don tsam ston pa ni gzugs la bdag yod dam med ces the tshom za ba la mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bdag med par bstan pa ni gtan tshigs mi rtag pa'i don tsam mam /
translated: Or, the mere thing is taught in the following example: “Because it is impermanent, it is momentary.”

original: dngos po tsam la the tshom za ba la mi rtag pa ni glo bur ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po tsam la the tshom za ba la mi rtag pa ni glo bur ba'o //
translated: When one is in doubt about the mere thing, the answer is given, “Impermanence is adventitious,

original: ring du mi gnas pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam grang tsam gyis bstan pa ste /
analyzed: ring du mi gnas pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam grang tsam gyis bstan pa ste /
translated: not lasting, and so on.”

original: thabs gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no other means.

original: der nges par gzung bar sbyar yang dngos po'i rkyen zhes te don med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: der nges par gzung bar sbyar yang dngos po'i rkyen zhes te don med pa nyid yin no //
translated: Even though the word “only” is applied to that, it is meaningless.

original: chos dang chos can de ni tshig gi mtha' bzhi char la brten pa ste /
analyzed: chos dang chos can de ni tshig gi mtha' bzhi char la brten pa ste /
translated: That is, the property and the subject are based on all four terms.🔽Even though the word “only” is applied to the subject in the statement, “The person is the only agent of action,” the property and the subject are not transcended.

original: lung bsgo ba la sogs pa la yang skyes bu la bsgo ba la sogs pa gtsor sbyar yang chos dang chos can las mi 'da'o //🔽de la ming gi rnam grangs ni khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lung bsgo ba la sogs pa la yang skyes bu la bsgo ba la sogs pa gtsor sbyar yang chos dang chos can las mi 'da'o //🔽de la ming gi rnam grangs ni khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the same way, even though the word “only” is applied to the property in the statement, “The person is the only experiencer of the result,” the property and the subject are not transcended.🔽In the same way, even though the word “only” is applied to the subject in the statement, “The person is the only agent of action,” the property and the subject are not transcended.🔽In the same way, even though the word “only” is applied to the property in the statement, “The person is the only experiencer of the result,” the property and the subject are not transcended.🔽In the same way, even though the word “only” is applied to the subject in the statement, “The person is the only agent of action,” the property and the subject are not transcended.🔽In the same way, even though the word “only” is applied to the property in the statement, “The person is the only experiencer of the result,” the property and the subject are not transcended.🔽In the same way, even though the word “only” is applied to the subject in the statement, “The person is the only agent of action,” the property and the subject are not transcended.🔽In the same way, even though the word “only” is applied to the property in the statement, “The person is the only experiencer of the result,” the property and the subject are not transcended.

original: de la dbye ba ni kun brtags pa'i chos dang yongs su grub pa'i chos las yongs su grub pa'i chos dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la dbye ba ni kun brtags pa'i chos dang yongs su grub pa'i chos las yongs su grub pa'i chos dpyad par bya ste /
translated: The analysis of the perfected entity is to be made in terms of the imagined entity and the perfected entity.

original: de yang chos nyid dang / rnam par gzhag pa dang / gnas skabs kyi dbye bas rnam pa gsum du sbyar @322a * //
analyzed: de yang chos nyid dang / rnam par gzhag pa dang / gnas skabs kyi dbye bas rnam pa gsum du sbyar @322a * //
translated: And that is to be applied in three ways, by way of the analysis of the nature of things, of the establishment of things, and of the occasion of things.

original: bar bya'o // de la chos nyid kyi chos dang / chos can ni don gzhan la mi ltos pas me'i tsha ba bzhin du chos nyid kyi grub pa ste /
analyzed: bar bya'o // de la chos nyid kyi chos dang / chos can ni don gzhan la mi ltos pas me'i tsha ba bzhin du chos nyid kyi grub pa ste /
translated: Therein, the nature of things and the entity of things are established as the nature of things, like the heat of fire, because they do not depend on another object.

original: de yang chos nyid de nyid pa dang / mtshan nyid pa'i dbye bas gnyis su gzung ngo //
analyzed: de yang chos nyid de nyid pa dang / mtshan nyid pa'i dbye bas gnyis su gzung ngo //
translated: And that is to be understood as twofold, by way of the analysis of the nature of things as they are and of the nature of things as characteristics.

original: de la de nyid pa ni bum pa la sogs pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / snam bu ma yin pa la sogs pa don gang la ji ltar grags pa de nyid yin par bsgrub pa rang gi sgras bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de la de nyid pa ni bum pa la sogs pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / snam bu ma yin pa la sogs pa don gang la ji ltar grags pa de nyid yin par bsgrub pa rang gi sgras bstan pa ste /
translated: Therein, as they are is established as that very thing which is known in whatever object, such as a pot, impermanence, non-cloth, etc., and is indicated by its own word.

original: dngos po dang mtshan nyid kyi sel ba ston ba bum pa ni bum pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po dang mtshan nyid kyi sel ba ston ba bum pa ni bum pa nyid do //
translated: The indication of the thing and the characteristic as exclusions is “A pot is a pot.”

original: mi rtag pa ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi rtag pa ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: Impermanence is impermanence.

original: snam bu ma yin pa nyid ni snam bu ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o//
analyzed: snam bu ma yin pa nyid ni snam bu ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o//
translated: Non-cloth is non-cloth.

original: de la bum pa ni zhes bya ba'i chos can gyi sgra ni bkar ba dang rnam par gcod pa'i mtshams sbyor ba'i skyen can gyis ni khyad par gzhan mi spong ba yin la /
analyzed: de la bum pa ni zhes bya ba'i chos can gyi sgra ni bkar ba dang rnam par gcod pa'i mtshams sbyor ba'i skyen can gyis ni khyad par gzhan mi spong ba yin la /
translated: In that regard, the term “subject” in “the pot” is a term that connects the exclusion and the selection, but it does not eliminate other distinctions.

original: bum pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i chos can gyi sgra ni bkar ba dang rnam par gcod pa yin gyi rkyen can yin pas khyad par gzhan spangs pa ste /
analyzed: bum pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i chos can gyi sgra ni bkar ba dang rnam par gcod pa yin gyi rkyen can yin pas khyad par gzhan spangs pa ste /
translated: The term “subject” in “pot-ness” is a term that both selects and excludes, and since it is a condition, it eliminates other distinctions.

original: des na bum ba bum pa nyid yin par bstan par dngos po'i khyad par gzhan snam bu la sogs pa rigs mthun pa las ni bkar //
analyzed: des na bum ba bum pa nyid yin par bstan par dngos po'i khyad par gzhan snam bu la sogs pa rigs mthun pa las ni bkar //
translated: Therefore, when it is taught that “the pot is pot-ness,” the other distinctions of the thing are selected from the homogeneous class, such as cloth and so on.

original: mtshan nyid kyi khyad par gzhan bum pa ma yin pa rnam par gcad de spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi khyad par gzhan bum pa ma yin pa rnam par gcad de spangs pa yin no //
translated: The other distinctions of the definition are excluded and eliminated, such as non-pot.

original: des ni dngos po dang mtshan nyid gzhan dang ma 'dres pa bsal ba byas pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni dngos po dang mtshan nyid gzhan dang ma 'dres pa bsal ba byas pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is established that the thing and the definition are not mixed with other things.

original: de yang lung bstan pa nye bar bstan pa'i mtha' can no //
analyzed: de yang lung bstan pa nye bar bstan pa'i mtha' can no //
translated: Moreover, it is concluded with the statement of the prediction.

original: chos nyid mtshan nyid pa ni sgra gzhan gyis don gyi khyad par ji ltar grags pa de las gzhan pa bstan pa ste /
analyzed: chos nyid mtshan nyid pa ni sgra gzhan gyis don gyi khyad par ji ltar grags pa de las gzhan pa bstan pa ste /
translated: The characteristic of reality is the teaching of a meaning that is different from the one that is well known through another term.

original: bum pa mi rtag pa dang / byas pa dang bdag med pa la sogs par bstan pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: bum pa mi rtag pa dang / byas pa dang bdag med pa la sogs par bstan pa'i yul lo //
translated: It is the object of the teaching of impermanence, production, selflessness, and so on of a pot.

original: snam bum yin pa dang / rtag pa ma yin pa la sogs pa yang sbyor te /
analyzed: snam bum yin pa dang / rtag pa ma yin pa la sogs pa yang sbyor te /
translated: A cloth is a pot, and it is not permanent, and so on.

original: de yang dgag bya la ltos pas rnam par gzhag pa'i chos yin gyi gzhan nyid kyi chos ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang dgag bya la ltos pas rnam par gzhag pa'i chos yin gyi gzhan nyid kyi chos ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is a phenomenon that is established in dependence on the object of negation, and it is not a phenomenon of difference.

original: des na mi rtag pa la sogs pa yang mtshan nyid tsam du grub kyi //
analyzed: des na mi rtag pa la sogs pa yang mtshan nyid tsam du grub kyi //
translated: Therefore, impermanence and so on are established as mere characteristics.

original: bum pa ni 'bru yod ces bya ba la sogs pa ltar bsgrub par bya ba la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa ni 'bru yod ces bya ba la sogs pa ltar bsgrub par bya ba la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: A pot is not established in dependence on the object of affirmation, as in the case of the statement, “Where there is grain, there is a granary.”

original: ci'i phyir mtshan nyid pa zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mtshan nyid pa zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called the characteristic?

original: spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid des dngos po de mtshon par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid des dngos po de mtshon par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that entity is posited by the characteristic which indicates its universal and particular characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid de yang ltos pa'i bye brag gis khyad par gcig kyang gnyi ga'i bdag nyid yin no //🔽chos nyid mtshan nyid ba la sogs pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i sgra rnams la nges @322b bar gzung ba'i rkyen rnam par gzhag pa ni gsal ba'i bye brag gis te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid de yang ltos pa'i bye brag gis khyad par gcig kyang gnyi ga'i bdag nyid yin no // chos nyid mtshan nyid ba la sogs pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i sgra rnams la nges @322b bar gzung ba'i rkyen rnam par gzhag pa ni gsal ba'i bye brag gis te /
translated: And that characteristic is one and the same, by the difference of dependence, the nature of both.🔽The restrictive condition is posited for the words “reality,” “characteristic,” etc., which will occur below, by the difference of manifestation.

original: nyan pa po'i bum pa la sogs pa'i don la mi rtag pa tsam du grub kyang rtag pa'i lhag ma lus par dogs pa la chos kyi sgra la nges par gzung bar byas pas rang dang mi ldan pa dang / chos gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcad pa byas pa yin no //
analyzed: nyan pa po'i bum pa la sogs pa'i don la mi rtag pa tsam du grub kyang rtag pa'i lhag ma lus par dogs pa la chos kyi sgra la nges par gzung bar byas pas rang dang mi ldan pa dang / chos gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcad pa byas pa yin no //
translated: In the case of the listener, the meaning of the word “pot,” etc., is established as mere impermanence, but the remainder of permanence is suspected. By the restrictive condition of the word “reality,” that which is not endowed with that is excluded, and that which is endowed with another reality is excluded.

original: gang gi tshe bum pa la lto yangs pa mgrin pa zhum pa tsam du grub kyang snod gzhan la yang mtshan nyid de srid par dogs pa'i tshe chos la nges par gzung bar sbyar bas chos de chos can gzhan dang ldan pa dang / rang dang mi ldan pa'i lhag ma lus pa rnam par gcod pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bum pa la lto yangs pa mgrin pa zhum pa tsam du grub kyang snod gzhan la yang mtshan nyid de srid par dogs pa'i tshe chos la nges par gzung bar sbyar bas chos de chos can gzhan dang ldan pa dang / rang dang mi ldan pa'i lhag ma lus pa rnam par gcod pa yin te /
translated: When a pot is established as having a wide belly and a narrow neck, but there is doubt that those characteristics may exist in another vessel, then the application of ascertainment of the property to the subject eliminates the property belonging to another subject and the remainder that does not belong to itself.

original: de dag ni de la phan pa'i rkyen can zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni de la phan pa'i rkyen can zhes bya'o //
translated: Those are called “having conditions that are helpful to it.”

original: gang gi tshe 'dod pa de dag med pa'i tshe ni gnas gnyi gar nges par bzung ba sbyar yang dngos po'i rkyen tsam ste don med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'dod pa de dag med pa'i tshe ni gnas gnyi gar nges par bzung ba sbyar yang dngos po'i rkyen tsam ste don med pa nyid do //
translated: When those are not desired, then even if the application of ascertainment of both the subject and the property is made, it is just a condition of the thing, and it is pointless.

original: chos nyid mtshan nyid pa de yang gnyug ma dang glo bur ba'i dbye bas gnyis su gzung ste /
analyzed: chos nyid mtshan nyid pa de yang gnyug ma dang glo bur ba'i dbye bas gnyis su gzung ste /
translated: That real characteristic is also apprehended as twofold by the division into intrinsic and adventitious.

original: gser gyi kha dog ser ba nyid dang / g-ya' sngon po lta bu'o //
analyzed: gser gyi kha dog ser ba nyid dang / g-ya' sngon po lta bu'o //
translated: The intrinsic is like the yellow color of gold, and the adventitious is like a blue stain.

original: ci'i phyir glo bur ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir glo bur ba yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it adventitious?

original: me la sogs pa'i gzhan bsten pas rang gi byed pa las 'das shing mtshan nyid de las grol bar 'gyur ba'i dor bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me la sogs pa'i gzhan bsten pas rang gi byed pa las 'das shing mtshan nyid de las grol bar 'gyur ba'i dor bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is to be rejected, since it is beyond one's own activity by relying on another, such as fire, and is liberated from that characteristic.

original: cig shos ni de las bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: cig shos ni de las bzlog pa yin no //
translated: The other is the opposite of that.

original: glo bur ba de yang kha cig tu ni grub pa dang ba de ba thog ma dang tha ma gnyis ka nyams pa las shes par bya ste /
analyzed: glo bur ba de yang kha cig tu ni grub pa dang ba de ba thog ma dang tha ma gnyis ka nyams pa las shes par bya ste /
translated: That adventitious is to be understood in some cases from the loss of both the beginning and end of that which is established and clear,

original: chu'i rnyog ma bzhin no //
analyzed: chu'i rnyog ma bzhin no //
translated: like the turbidity of water.

original: kha cig tu ni bde ba nyams pa tha ma zhig las shes par bya ste /
analyzed: kha cig tu ni bde ba nyams pa tha ma zhig las shes par bya ste /
translated: In some cases, it is to be understood from the loss of the end of that which is clear,

original: gser gyi g-ya' 'am lcags kyi tsha tsha bzhin no //
analyzed: gser gyi g-ya' 'am lcags kyi tsha tsha bzhin no //
translated: like the rust of gold or the slag of iron.

original: rnam par gzhag pa'i yang dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa dang / don rnam par gzhag pa gnyis su gzung ngo //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa'i yang dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa dang / don rnam par gzhag pa gnyis su gzung ngo //
translated: The establishment of the object is also to be understood as twofold: the establishment of the object of observation and the establishment of the object.

original: de la dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa ni dmigs pa 'jug ldog go //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa ni dmigs pa 'jug ldog go //
translated: Among them, the establishment of the object of observation is the engagement and disengagement of the object of observation.

original: don rnam par gzhag pa ni don 'jug ldog ste /
analyzed: don rnam par gzhag pa ni don 'jug ldog ste /
translated: The establishment of the object is the engagement and disengagement of the object.

original: de dag glo bur gyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la ltos pas grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag glo bur gyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la ltos pas grub pa yin no //
translated: They are established in dependence on some special adventitious factor.

original: de la dang po ni dmigs pa po shes pa ltos pa yin la /
analyzed: de la dang po ni dmigs pa po shes pa ltos pa yin la /
translated: The first is in dependence on the consciousness that apprehends it.

original: gnyis pa ni 'brel zla dang 'gal zla'i don la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni 'brel zla dang 'gal zla'i don la ltos pa'o //
translated: The second is in dependence on the object that is related to it or that is contradictory to it.

original: de nyid kyis na don rnam par gzhag pa zhes don bye brag tu bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na don rnam par gzhag pa zhes don bye brag tu bya'o //
translated: For that very reason, the classification of objects is a specific classification of objects.

original: dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa yang de dmigs pa dang / de la dmigs pa'i dbye bas gnyis su gsungs te /
analyzed: dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa yang de dmigs pa dang / de la dmigs pa'i dbye bas gnyis su gsungs te /
translated: The classification of objects of observation is said to be twofold, in terms of the classification of the object of observation and the object of observation of that.

original: dmigs pa de yang bum pa la sogs pa nyid dngos su myong bas @323a * //🔽dmigs pa dang / ma myong yang ma bskal bas dmigs par gzhag la /
analyzed: dmigs pa de yang bum pa la sogs pa nyid dngos su myong bas @323a * // dmigs pa dang / ma myong yang ma bskal bas dmigs par gzhag la /
translated: That object of observation is posited as an object of observation by the direct experience of a pot and so on.🔽It is also posited as an object of observation by not being excluded, even though it is not experienced.

original: ma myong yang ma bskal bas dmigs pa de ni ma bskal yang ma myong ba la ltos pas mi dmigs par yang gzhag go //
analyzed: ma myong yang ma bskal bas dmigs pa de ni ma bskal yang ma myong ba la ltos pas mi dmigs par yang gzhag go //
translated: That object of observation is also posited as not an object of observation by not being excluded, even though it is not experienced, in dependence on not being experienced.

original: gzhan yang bskal ba gsum gyi bskal ba de yang bskal bas mi dmigs pa'i chos su gzhag / de la dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa yang //
analyzed: gzhan yang bskal ba gsum gyi bskal ba de yang bskal bas mi dmigs pa'i chos su gzhag / de la dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa yang //
translated: Moreover, that eon of three eons is posited as a phenomenon not observed by an eon.

original: sa phyogs kyi bye brag la sogs par bum pa la sogs pa dmigs pa 'jug pa dang ldog pa yang snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sa phyogs kyi bye brag la sogs par bum pa la sogs pa dmigs pa 'jug pa dang ldog pa yang snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Also, with respect to that, observation and nonobservation are like the previous example of the pot and so on in terms of the distinctions of place and so on.

original: de dag ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i dbye bas ci rigs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: de dag ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i dbye bas ci rigs su gzung ngo //
translated: They should be understood as appropriate by the divisions of direct perception and inference.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i ma bskal ba ni rang bzhin phra ba las bzlog pa tsam mo //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i ma bskal ba ni rang bzhin phra ba las bzlog pa tsam mo //
translated: An inference of nonobservation is merely the opposite of a subtle nature.

original: don rnam par gzhag pa'i yang rdzas dang yon tan gyi dbye bas gnyis su sbyar te /
analyzed: don rnam par gzhag pa'i yang rdzas dang yon tan gyi dbye bas gnyis su sbyar te /
translated: With respect to the presentation of objects, they are classified as two by the divisions of substance and quality.

original: de la rdzas zhes bya ba ni don dang shes pa dang 'brel ba'i don rnam pa gnyis gzhan la ma ltos pas bsgrub nus pa rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung ba'i bum pa la sogs pa 'dus byas kyi dngos nyid yin la /
analyzed: de la rdzas zhes bya ba ni don dang shes pa dang 'brel ba'i don rnam pa gnyis gzhan la ma ltos pas bsgrub nus pa rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung ba'i bum pa la sogs pa 'dus byas kyi dngos nyid yin la /
translated: With respect to that, substance is an object that is related to an object of knowledge and is capable of being established without relying on another. It is the intrinsic reality of conditioned things such as a pot that arises from the assembly of causes and conditions.

original: de la brten pa'i chos dang chos can ni rdzas kyi chos dang chos can no //
analyzed: de la brten pa'i chos dang chos can ni rdzas kyi chos dang chos can no //
translated: The phenomena and the subjects based on that are the substantial phenomena and the substantial subjects.

original: yon tan ni 'dus byas de dag gi mtshan nyid mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gos par byas pa rnams te /
analyzed: yon tan ni 'dus byas de dag gi mtshan nyid mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gos par byas pa rnams te /
translated: The qualities are the particularities that are the characteristics of impermanence and so on of those conditioned phenomena.

original: de gzhir gzhag pa'i chos dang chos can rnams ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de gzhir gzhag pa'i chos dang chos can rnams ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The phenomena and the subjects based on that are the second, the phenomena and the subjects based on the qualities.

original: 'o na gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa gang gis bsdus she na /
analyzed: 'o na gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa gang gis bsdus she na /
translated: Well then, by what are form, sound, and so on included?

original: 'dir yon tan gyis bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir yon tan gyis bsdus pa ste /
translated: Here they are included by the qualities.

original: bum pa la sogs pa la brten pa'i khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa la brten pa'i khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because they are the particularities based on the vase and so on.

original: de yang rdzas kyi chos su sbyar ba'i tshe ni chos nyid kyi chos dang chos can du 'jog ste /
analyzed: de yang rdzas kyi chos su sbyar ba'i tshe ni chos nyid kyi chos dang chos can du 'jog ste /
translated: Moreover, when they are applied to substantial phenomena, they are posited as the phenomena and the subjects of reality.

original: rang gi ngo bos grub pa de dag ci rigs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos grub pa de dag ci rigs su gzung ngo //
translated: Those that are established by their own nature are apprehended as appropriate.

original: 'dir yang rtsod pa smra ba gzhan sgra dang dri la sogs pa rlung dang tsandan la sogs pa las yul rnam par chad pa na gnas pa'i phyir rdzas nyid du gzung ngo zhes 'dod do //
analyzed: 'dir yang rtsod pa smra ba gzhan sgra dang dri la sogs pa rlung dang tsandan la sogs pa las yul rnam par chad pa na gnas pa'i phyir rdzas nyid du gzung ngo zhes 'dod do //
translated: Here, the proponents of the thesis that sound is a substance say that sound and smell, etc., are apprehended as substances because they are located in a place that is separate from wind and sandalwood, etc.

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not logical.

original: sgra yang dung la sogs pa la yul gzhan pa mi gnas par mngon sum gyis grub pa yin la /
analyzed: sgra yang dung la sogs pa la yul gzhan pa mi gnas par mngon sum gyis grub pa yin la /
translated: Sound is established by direct perception to be located in a place that is separate from the conch, etc.

original: dri yang rlung la tsandan la sogs pas bsgos pa nyid kyi yul gzhan na dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: dri yang rlung la tsandan la sogs pas bsgos pa nyid kyi yul gzhan na dmigs pa ste /
translated: Smell is perceived in a place that is separate from the wind, etc., because it is infused in sandalwood, etc.

original: dngos po la ma ltos par rang grub pa ni med do //
analyzed: dngos po la ma ltos par rang grub pa ni med do //
translated: There is no establishment of sound, etc., without depending on things.

original: de bas bum pa'i dkar ba dang / zlum pa la sogs pa 'jam pa dang rtsub pa'i bar du rdzas de'i yon tan du gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bas bum pa'i dkar ba dang / zlum pa la sogs pa 'jam pa dang rtsub pa'i bar du rdzas de'i yon tan du gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Therefore, the whiteness, roundness, etc., of a pot, up to its smoothness and roughness, should be apprehended as the qualities of that substance,

original: rdzas su ni ma @323b yin no ;
analyzed: rdzas su ni ma @323b yin no ;
translated: but not as substances.

original: / kha cig tu dbang po tha dad kyi yul yin pa'i phyir dngos po tha dad pa'i zhes zer na /
analyzed: / kha cig tu dbang po tha dad kyi yul yin pa'i phyir dngos po tha dad pa'i zhes zer na /
translated: If someone says that sound, etc., are different things because they are the objects of different sense faculties,

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: that is not logical.

original: dbyibs la sogs pas ma nges pa dang tsandan dang dung la sogs par ma bzung bar gud du bzung bar mi nus pa dang / kha cig tu yon tan so sor nges pa la dmigs pa yang dbang po rnams kyi nus pa so sor nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbyibs la sogs pas ma nges pa dang tsandan dang dung la sogs par ma bzung bar gud du bzung bar mi nus pa dang / kha cig tu yon tan so sor nges pa la dmigs pa yang dbang po rnams kyi nus pa so sor nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and that it cannot be apprehended separately without being apprehended as color, etc., or as sandalwood, a conch, etc., and that the individual determination of the qualities is observed in some cases because the capacities of the senses are individually determined.

original: kha cig na re de dag gi khyad par shes pas 'dod pa'i tshe na rnam par gzhag pa'i chos can no zhes kyang zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re de dag gi khyad par shes pas 'dod pa'i tshe na rnam par gzhag pa'i chos can no zhes kyang zer ro //
translated: Some say that the dharmin is established as a dharma when it is distinguished by the knowledge of its particularities.

original: de la rdzas kyi chos dang chos can gyi don du 'jug pa dang ldog pa de yang yod par bsgrub pa dang med par dgag pa dang / yin par sgrub pa dang ma yin par dgag pa'o //
analyzed: de la rdzas kyi chos dang chos can gyi don du 'jug pa dang ldog pa de yang yod par bsgrub pa dang med par dgag pa dang / yin par sgrub pa dang ma yin par dgag pa'o //
translated: The engagement and disengagement of the substance in the sense of the dharma and dharmin is also established as existent and negated as nonexistent, and is established as being and negated as nonbeing.

original: yod par sgrub pa ni khyad par gzhan dang ldan pa bsgrub pa ste /
analyzed: yod par sgrub pa ni khyad par gzhan dang ldan pa bsgrub pa ste /
translated: The establishment of existence is the establishment of possession of another particularity.

original: dngos po khyad par gzhan dang ldan pa dang / rang gi chos kyi khyad par gzhan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po khyad par gzhan dang ldan pa dang / rang gi chos kyi khyad par gzhan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is the establishment of a thing as possessing another particularity and the establishment of its own dharma as possessing another particularity.

original: de la dngos po gzhan dang ldan pa ni bum pa na 'bru yod /
analyzed: de la dngos po gzhan dang ldan pa ni bum pa na 'bru yod /
translated: The existence of other things is, for example, saying that there is grain in the pot,

original: nor yod / 'o ma yod /
analyzed: nor yod / 'o ma yod /
translated: there is wealth, there is milk,

original: mar yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin la /
analyzed: mar yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin la /
translated: there is butter, and so on.

original: de dag gi med par dgag pa yang de nyid do //
analyzed: de dag gi med par dgag pa yang de nyid do //
translated: The negation of their nonexistence is also just that.

original: rang gi khyad par ldan pa ni bum pa la yang lung yod /
analyzed: rang gi khyad par ldan pa ni bum pa la yang lung yod /
translated: The existence of its own attributes is, for example, saying that the pot has a spout,

original: ri mo yod /
analyzed: ri mo yod /
translated: has a pattern,

original: dri ma yod ces bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: dri ma yod ces bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: has stains, and so on.

original: de dag med par dgag pa'i yang de snyed do //
analyzed: de dag med par dgag pa'i yang de snyed do //
translated: The negation of their nonexistence is also just that.

original: bsgrub par bya ba de dag dang dgag par bya ba de dag ni 'brel pa'i zla ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba de dag dang dgag par bya ba de dag ni 'brel pa'i zla ste /
translated: Those things to be established and those things to be negated are related.

original: de dag la ltos nas grub pa de dag kyang rkyang ba yang yin la /
analyzed: de dag la ltos nas grub pa de dag kyang rkyang ba yang yin la /
translated: In dependence on them, those established are also singular and

original: srid pa'i dgag pa dang / sgrub par yang yin no //
analyzed: srid pa'i dgag pa dang / sgrub par yang yin no //
translated: are also negated and established.🔽The negation of the superimposition of the impossibility of other things is the negation of the superimposition that the existence of a pot and so on is impossible.

original: gzhan mi srid pa'i sgro 'dogs pa dgag pa bum pa la shes pa la sogs pa yod pa sgro 'dogs pa mi srid pa'i sgro 'degs pa dgag pa 'di yang yongs su grub pa yin pas 'di sbyar la /
analyzed: gzhan mi srid pa'i sgro 'dogs pa dgag pa bum pa la shes pa la sogs pa yod pa sgro 'dogs pa mi srid pa'i sgro 'degs pa dgag pa 'di yang yongs su grub pa yin pas 'di sbyar la /
translated: This is also a complete negation.

original: grub pa ni kun brtags pa kho na yin pas mi gzung ngo //
analyzed: grub pa ni kun brtags pa kho na yin pas mi gzung ngo //
translated: But since the established is only the imagined, it is not to be taken.

original: yin par sgrub pa yang srid pa dang mi srid pa gnyis so //
analyzed: yin par sgrub pa yang srid pa dang mi srid pa gnyis so //
translated: Proof is also twofold: possible and impossible.

original: de la srid pa yang 'gal zla la ltos par sbyar ba dang / 'brel zla ba ltos pas rkyang pa dbye bas gnyis so //
analyzed: de la srid pa yang 'gal zla la ltos par sbyar ba dang / 'brel zla ba ltos pas rkyang pa dbye bas gnyis so //
translated: Of these, the possible is also twofold: the application in terms of the counter-correlate and the application in terms of the related.

original: de la 'gal zla la ltos pa ni bum pa'i bzang po dang ngan pa dang chen po dang chung du la sogs pas chos 'gal zla'i dngos po re re la ltos na re re grub la /
analyzed: de la 'gal zla la ltos pa ni bum pa'i bzang po dang ngan pa dang chen po dang chung du la sogs pas chos 'gal zla'i dngos po re re la ltos na re re grub la /
translated: Of these, the application in terms of the counter-correlate is as follows: the good and bad, large and small, etc. of a pot are established one by one in dependence on each of the counter-correlate properties.

original: gnyis la ltos nas 'gal ba'i chos gnyis 'grub pa'i phung po gsum pa yang 'grub ste des na sbyar ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis la ltos nas 'gal ba'i chos gnyis 'grub pa'i phung po gsum pa yang 'grub ste des na sbyar ba zhes bya'o //
translated: And in dependence on the two, the two counter-correlate properties are established. Thus, a third category is also established. Therefore, it is called “application.”

original: de bzhin du bzang po ma yin pa dang ngan pa ma yin pa la @324a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du bzang po ma yin pa dang ngan pa ma yin pa la @324a * //
translated: In the same way, the non-good and the non-bad, etc.

original: sogs pa ma yin par dgag pa phung po gsum pa'i bar du 'grub par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa ma yin par dgag pa phung po gsum pa'i bar du 'grub par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: up to the negation of the third category are to be applied as established.

original: yin par bsgrub pa dang ma yin par dgag pa'i 'brel zla la ltos pa rkyang pa ni bya ba'i chos te /
analyzed: yin par bsgrub pa dang ma yin par dgag pa'i 'brel zla la ltos pa rkyang pa ni bya ba'i chos te /
translated: The mere relation to the property of the probandum and the property of the negation of the probandum is the property of action.

original: de yang rgyu dang 'bras bu la yod pa dang / byas pa po dang las la yod pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te /🔽de la rgyu dang byed pa po la ltos pa'i bya ba ni 'bras bu dang las la ltos nas dbye'o //
analyzed: de yang rgyu dang 'bras bu la yod pa dang / byas pa po dang las la yod pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te / de la rgyu dang byed pa po la ltos pa'i bya ba ni 'bras bu dang las la ltos nas dbye'o //
translated: Moreover, it is of four types by the division into that which exists in cause and effect and that which exists in the agent and object.🔽The property of action that depends on cause and agent is divided in dependence on effect and object.

original: 'bras bu dang las la yod la ltos pa'i bya ba'i chos ni rgyu dang byed pa po ltos par grub cing dbye ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang las la yod la ltos pa'i bya ba'i chos ni rgyu dang byed pa po ltos par grub cing dbye ba'o //
translated: The property of action that exists in effect and object is established as depending on cause and agent and is divided.

original: de rgyu le yod pa'i bya ba'i chos ni bum pa dang dpal dang 'byor pas skyed par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de rgyu le yod pa'i bya ba'i chos ni bum pa dang dpal dang 'byor pas skyed par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: The property of action that exists in cause is, for example, “The vase is produced by clay, Śrī, and wealth.”

original: byed pa po la yod pa'i bya ba'i chos ni bum pas chu 'chu /
analyzed: byed pa po la yod pa'i bya ba'i chos ni bum pas chu 'chu /
translated: The property of action that exists in the agent is, for example, “The vase holds water,

original: 'o ma 'chu /
analyzed: 'o ma 'chu /
translated: holds milk,

original: 'bru 'dzin / nor 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'bru 'dzin / nor 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: holds grain, holds wealth.”

original: 'bras bu la yod pa'i bya ba'i chos ni bum pas sa las gyur pa nyid dang / zangs las gyur pa nyid dang / mes btsos pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu la yod pa'i bya ba'i chos ni bum pas sa las gyur pa nyid dang / zangs las gyur pa nyid dang / mes btsos pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: The action that exists in the effect is such as the fact of being made of clay, the fact of being made of copper, the fact of being baked by fire, and so on.

original: las la yod pa'i bya ba ni bum pa 'di spyad par bya //🔽bcang bar bya /
analyzed: las la yod pa'i bya ba ni bum pa 'di spyad par bya // bcang bar bya /
translated: The action that exists in the object is such as the fact of being used,🔽the fact of being held,

original: sba bar bya /
analyzed: sba bar bya /
translated: the fact of being stored,

original: tshogs par bya /
analyzed: tshogs par bya /
translated: the fact of being assembled,

original: sbyug  par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: sbyug  par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: the fact of being filled, and so on.

original: bya ba'i chos dang chos can de la yang gang gi tshe rgyu dang byed pa po'i gtso bo'i chos can du sbyar ba'i tshe ni 'bras bu dang las las chos bye brag tu byed pa'i chos can zhes bya la //
analyzed: bya ba'i chos dang chos can de la yang gang gi tshe rgyu dang byed pa po'i gtso bo'i chos can du sbyar ba'i tshe ni 'bras bu dang las las chos bye brag tu byed pa'i chos can zhes bya la //
translated: Moreover, with regard to the action and the property-possessor that exists, when it is connected as the property-possessor that is the primary cause and agent, then it is called the property-possessor that distinguishes the property from the effect and object.

original: gang tshe 'bras bu dang / las gtso bo'i chos can du sbyar ba'i tshe ni cig shos gnyis po bye brag tu byed pa'i chos can du sbyar ro //
analyzed: gang tshe 'bras bu dang / las gtso bo'i chos can du sbyar ba'i tshe ni cig shos gnyis po bye brag tu byed pa'i chos can du sbyar ro //
translated: When it is connected as the property-possessor that is the primary effect and object, then the other two are connected as the property-possessor that distinguishes.

original: de dag ma yin par dgag pa yang dgag bya la ltos pa de nyid du sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dag ma yin par dgag pa yang dgag bya la ltos pa de nyid du sbyar ro //
translated: The non-affirming negation is also connected in that very way, in dependence on the object of negation.

original: gzhan mi srid pa'i bum pa la snam bu re lde ka ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor sgro 'dogs pa ni kun brtags pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan mi srid pa'i bum pa la snam bu re lde ka ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor sgro 'dogs pa ni kun brtags pa yin la /
translated: The superimposition of the nature of cloth, a straw mat, a pillar, and so on on to a pot, which is impossible, is the imaginary.

original: de dag dgag pa ni yongs su grub pa'i chos nyid du gzung ngo //
analyzed: de dag dgag pa ni yongs su grub pa'i chos nyid du gzung ngo //
translated: Its negation is apprehended as the perfected nature.

original: gsum pa gnas skabs kyis ni gnas skabs nyid yin pa'i phyir chos nyid kyi grub pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: gsum pa gnas skabs kyis ni gnas skabs nyid yin pa'i phyir chos nyid kyi grub pa yang ma yin la /
translated: Third, in terms of states, since it is a state itself, it is not established as a nature.

original: don gzhan la ltos pas kyang ma yin pa /
analyzed: don gzhan la ltos pas kyang ma yin pa /
translated: Nor is it something that relies on a different object.

original: bum pa'i nyal ba dang / langs pa dang / kha bub dang / gan rkyal la sogs pa'i chos re re zhig tu gzung ngo //
analyzed: bum pa'i nyal ba dang / langs pa dang / kha bub dang / gan rkyal la sogs pa'i chos re re zhig tu gzung ngo //
translated: The states of lying down, standing up, being upside down, lying on one’s side, and so on of a pot are apprehended as individual phenomena.

original: chos kyi grangs rab tu dbye ba ji snyed pa chos can gyi grangs kyang de snyed du 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos kyi grangs rab tu dbye ba ji snyed pa chos can gyi grangs kyang de snyed du 'gyur te /
translated: The number of phenomena is the number of phenomena.

original: chos can gcig ces bya ba ni khyad par gzhan mi spong ba'i sgra gcig gis brjod pa yin pa dang / dngos @324b po cha shas med pa gcig la chos can du zhen pa'i bsam pas sbyar ba'i ngor byas pas tsam du zad do //
analyzed: chos can gcig ces bya ba ni khyad par gzhan mi spong ba'i sgra gcig gis brjod pa yin pa dang / dngos @324b po cha shas med pa gcig la chos can du zhen pa'i bsam pas sbyar ba'i ngor byas pas tsam du zad do //
translated: And the term mere is used from the perspective of the thought that conceives of a single, partless entity as a subject.

original: bye brag rnam par gzhag pa ni chos dang chos can gyi dang / chos nang gi dbye ba gnyis su dbye'o //
analyzed: bye brag rnam par gzhag pa ni chos dang chos can gyi dang / chos nang gi dbye ba gnyis su dbye'o //
translated: The classification of particulars is twofold: the particular of a property and the particular of a property-possessor.

original: chos dang chos can gyi bye brag la chos nyid de nyid pa'i chos dang chos can gyi shan ni /
analyzed: chos dang chos can gyi bye brag la chos nyid de nyid pa'i chos dang chos can gyi shan ni /
translated: The particular of a property and the particular of a property-possessor are as follows.

original: sgra gcig gis bstan pas khyad par gzhan spong ba dang / mi spong ba'i sgra'i shan 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
analyzed: sgra gcig gis bstan pas khyad par gzhan spong ba dang / mi spong ba'i sgra'i shan 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
translated: Since they are indicated by a single term, the difference between them is merely whether or not other features are excluded.

original: de las don gzhan mi sred pas don gyi khyad par gzhan spong ba dang mi spong pa'i shan ni kun brtags kho nar zad do //
analyzed: de las don gzhan mi sred pas don gyi khyad par gzhan spong ba dang mi spong pa'i shan ni kun brtags kho nar zad do //
translated: Since no other meaning is required, the difference in meaning between excluding and not excluding other features is only imagined.

original: lhag ma chos nyid kyi tshan nyid pa dang gnas skabs pa'i chos nyid dang / chos can gyi bye brag ni sgra tha dad kyis byas pa'i khyad par gzhan spong ba dang mi spong pa'i sgra'i shan dang / don gzhan srid pa nyid kyis na don gyi khyad par gzhan spong ba dang mi spong ba'i shan dang /
analyzed: lhag ma chos nyid kyi tshan nyid pa dang gnas skabs pa'i chos nyid dang / chos can gyi bye brag ni sgra tha dad kyis byas pa'i khyad par gzhan spong ba dang mi spong pa'i sgra'i shan dang / don gzhan srid pa nyid kyis na don gyi khyad par gzhan spong ba dang mi spong ba'i shan dang /
translated: The remaining three are the difference of the nature of the phenomenon itself, the difference of the nature of the state, and the difference of the phenomenon itself.🔽The difference of the phenomenon itself is threefold: the difference of the word, which is the difference of the words that exclude or do not exclude other distinctions; the difference of the meaning, which is the difference of the meanings that exclude or do not exclude other distinctions; and the difference of the reverse, which is the difference of the extent of the pervasion.

original: khyab che chung gis byas pa'i ldog pa'i tha dad kyi shan dang gsum ste /
analyzed: khyab che chung gis byas pa'i ldog pa'i tha dad kyi shan dang gsum ste /
translated: The difference of the phenomenon itself is the basis of the difference between the phenomenon and the subject.

original: de las chos dang chos can gyi khyad par gyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir /🔽khyad par gzhan spong ba dang mi spong ba'i chos dang / chos can bye brag tu byed pa'i gtso bo yin no //
analyzed: de las chos dang chos can gyi khyad par gyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir / khyad par gzhan spong ba dang mi spong ba'i chos dang / chos can bye brag tu byed pa'i gtso bo yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the main factor that makes the difference between the phenomenon and the subject.

original: rnam par gzhag pa'i chos rnams dang chos can gyi bye brag ni sngar smos pa gsum pa gsum gyi steng du chos rnams ni don gzhan la ltos pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa'i chos rnams dang chos can gyi bye brag ni sngar smos pa gsum pa gsum gyi steng du chos rnams ni don gzhan la ltos pa yin la /
translated: The difference of the phenomenon and the subject is the difference of the three previously mentioned differences, plus the difference of the phenomenon and the subject themselves.

original: chos can ni ma ltos pa ste /
analyzed: chos can ni ma ltos pa ste /
translated: The phenomenon depends on another meaning,🔽but the subject does not depend on another meaning.

original: der yang bye brag tu byed pa'i gtso bo ni sngar bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: der yang bye brag tu byed pa'i gtso bo ni sngar bshad pa yin no //
translated: The principal distinctions are as explained above.

original: dngos po dngos kyi dbang du byas na chos nyid kyi chos dang chos can ni gcig kho nar yongs su grub pa yin pas shin tu gcig pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: dngos po dngos kyi dbang du byas na chos nyid kyi chos dang chos can ni gcig kho nar yongs su grub pa yin pas shin tu gcig pa nyid yin te /
translated: In terms of the actual thing, the reality of the phenomenon and the phenomenon itself are established as one and the same, so they are completely identical.

original: tha dad pa'i blos bslad pa yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i blos bslad pa yin no //
translated: They are polluted by the mind that apprehends them as different.🔽In this context, the basis for the mind apprehending them as different is the actual thing.

original: skabs 'dir blos tha dad du 'dzin pa'i rten ni yang dag par chos can gyi sgra ni gcig nyid yin la /🔽chos kyi sgra ni du ma yin te /
analyzed: skabs 'dir blos tha dad du 'dzin pa'i rten ni yang dag par chos can gyi sgra ni gcig nyid yin la / chos kyi sgra ni du ma yin te /
translated: The term phenomenon refers to the one, and the term phenomenon refers to the many.

original: des na gcig dang du ma'i sgra tha dad kyis byas pa yin no //
analyzed: des na gcig dang du ma'i sgra tha dad kyis byas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the terms one and many are distinguished.

original: rnam par gzhag pa'i chos dang chos can ni don gzhan la mi ltos par dngos po dngos kyis yongs su grub pa med pas dngos po dngos kyi dbang du byas na kun brtags pa kho na ste /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa'i chos dang chos can ni don gzhan la mi ltos par dngos po dngos kyis yongs su grub pa med pas dngos po dngos kyi dbang du byas na kun brtags pa kho na ste /
translated: In terms of the actual thing, the established phenomenon and the phenomenon itself are not established as different things, so they are only imagined.

original: gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir blos gzhag pa kho nas zad do //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir blos gzhag pa kho nas zad do //
translated: Since they depend on other things, they are exhausted by being posited by the mind.

original: gnas skabs kyi chos kyang gnas skabs nyid kyis yongs su grub pa yin pas gnas skabs tsam du gzhag go //
analyzed: gnas skabs kyi chos kyang gnas skabs nyid kyis yongs su grub pa yin pas gnas skabs tsam du gzhag go //
translated: And since even the phenomena of the present are fully established by the present itself, they are posited as merely present.

original: chos nang gi bye brag la chos nyid kyi chos rnams @325a * //
analyzed: chos nang gi bye brag la chos nyid kyi chos rnams @325a * //
translated: As for the specific phenomena, the phenomena of reality🔽are the qualities of milk, such as its white color, sweetness and softness, which are perceived in different things, such as a conch, cardamom and honey, and so on.

original: ni'o ma'i yon tan dkar ba dang / mngar ba dang / 'jam pa rnams dung dang / ka tsa lin da dang / sbrang rtsi la sogs pa'i spyod yul tha dad kyi dngos po rnams la 'jug pa dang / ldog pa mthong nas 'o ma la yang yon tan de dag tha dad du blos bzung ba yin te /
analyzed: ni'o ma'i yon tan dkar ba dang / mngar ba dang / 'jam pa rnams dung dang / ka tsa lin da dang / sbrang rtsi la sogs pa'i spyod yul tha dad kyi dngos po rnams la 'jug pa dang / ldog pa mthong nas 'o ma la yang yon tan de dag tha dad du blos bzung ba yin te /
translated: The mind apprehends those qualities as separate in milk as well.

original: de lta bu'i ngo bo gcig pa zhes bya la /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ngo bo gcig pa zhes bya la /
translated: Such is called a single entity.

original: dngos po dngos kyi dbang du byas na'o ma gsal ba'i rang bzhin tha na yul dang dus la sogs pa tsam gyis kyang gsal ba gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang ba de la yon tan de dag shin tu gcig pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po dngos kyi dbang du byas na'o ma gsal ba'i rang bzhin tha na yul dang dus la sogs pa tsam gyis kyang gsal ba gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang ba de la yon tan de dag shin tu gcig pa yin no //
translated: In terms of the actual entity, the nature of milk is clear, and even the slightest other clarity that follows, such as the place, time and so on, is extremely clear.

original: rnam par gzhag pa'i chos rnams ni 'brel zla dang / 'gal zla la ltos pa'i tha dad kyis tha dad par byas la grangs kyang de'i grangs byas pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa'i chos rnams ni 'brel zla dang / 'gal zla la ltos pa'i tha dad kyis tha dad par byas la grangs kyang de'i grangs byas pa yin no //
translated: The phenomena that are posited are differentiated by the difference of their associates and their contradictories, and their number is determined by their number.

original: mi srid pa'i sgro btags pa rnams kyang dgag pa ltos pa tha dad kyis byas pa yin no //🔽gzhan dag ni chos nyid kyi chos mi btags pa la sogs pa dang / dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa dang bum pa na 'bru yod par ldan par bsgrub pa dang / 'bru med par ldan par dgag pa la sogs pa chos thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa dang /
analyzed: mi srid pa'i sgro btags pa rnams kyang dgag pa ltos pa tha dad kyis byas pa yin no // gzhan dag ni chos nyid kyi chos mi btags pa la sogs pa dang / dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa dang bum pa na 'bru yod par ldan par bsgrub pa dang / 'bru med par ldan par dgag pa la sogs pa chos thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa dang /
translated: Even imputations of the impossible are negated by the difference of their dependence.🔽Others say that all phenomena are differentiated by their dependence on impermanence,

original: dmigs pa ma yin pa dang / ldan pa ma yin pa dang bral ba ma yin pa la sogs pa la ltos pas bye brag rnam par gzhag go zhes zer na /
analyzed: dmigs pa ma yin pa dang / ldan pa ma yin pa dang bral ba ma yin pa la sogs pa la ltos pas bye brag rnam par gzhag go zhes zer na /
translated: nonapprehension, nonpossession, and nonseparation, such as the nonimputation of the nature of phenomena, and the establishment of the possession of grain in a vase and the negation of the possession of nongrain.

original: de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste /
translated: That is also unacceptable.

original: mtshan nyi de 'gal ba bzlog bya de dag rnam par gcad pa rnam par gzhag pa ni blo'i sal bas mtshan nyid de dag mtshon par rnam par gzhag pa yin gyi /
analyzed: mtshan nyi de 'gal ba bzlog bya de dag rnam par gcad pa rnam par gzhag pa ni blo'i sal bas mtshan nyid de dag mtshon par rnam par gzhag pa yin gyi /
translated: The definition of a definition is that it is posited by the power of the mind as a definition that eliminates the contrary of the object to be defined.

original: mtshan nyid 'gal ba rnam par gcad pa de dag chos 'gal ba de dag 'grub par byed pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'gal ba rnam par gcad pa de dag chos 'gal ba de dag 'grub par byed pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But the elimination of contrary attributes does not establish the contrary attributes.

original: de dag kyang grub par byed pa ni sngar bshad pa rnams kho nar bzung ngo //
analyzed: de dag kyang grub par byed pa ni sngar bshad pa rnams kho nar bzung ngo //
translated: And those that establish them are only the ones previously explained.

original: dngos po dngos kyi dbang du byas na chos de dag las chos nyid kyi chos rnams ni shin tu gcig pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos po dngos kyi dbang du byas na chos de dag las chos nyid kyi chos rnams ni shin tu gcig pa yin la /
translated: In terms of the actual thing, among those attributes, the attributes of reality are completely one.

original: rnam par gzhag pa'i chos rnam ni ri bong gi rva lta bur med pa nyid yin pa ni chos dang chos can gyi skabs su bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa'i chos rnam ni ri bong gi rva lta bur med pa nyid yin pa ni chos dang chos can gyi skabs su bshad pa yin no //
translated: And the attributes of designation are like the horns of a rabbit, which do not exist at all. This is explained in the section on attributes and things possessing attributes.

original: gnas skabs pa nyid kyang gnas skabs pa nyid du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs pa nyid kyang gnas skabs pa nyid du blta bar bya'o //
translated: And the state of being a state should be seen as a state.

original: nges tsheg gzhan la brten pas na chos de dag dang ldan pas na chos can te /
analyzed: nges tsheg gzhan la brten pas na chos de dag dang ldan pas na chos can te /
translated: Since they are based on other things, they are called phenomena.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i rdzas ma gtogs par mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gud du gzung bar mi nus pas na gzhan la brten pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i rdzas ma gtogs par mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gud du gzung bar mi nus pas na gzhan la brten pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Since impermanence and so on cannot be apprehended separately from substances such as pots, they are called based on other things.

original: chos dang chos @325b can gtan la dbab pa slob dpon dze t'a ris mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: chos dang chos @325b can gtan la dbab pa slob dpon dze t'a ris mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the Ascertainment of Phenomena and Subjects composed by Ācārya Jetāri.
